alert.note: Alert for Bannock; Bingham; Caribou (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 20 at 4:02PM MDT until September 20 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pocatello has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Caribou County in southeastern Idaho... North central Bannock County in southeastern Idaho... Southeastern Bingham County in southeastern Idaho... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 401 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fort Hall Putnam Lodge, or 9 miles northeast of Pocatello, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Hall Mount Putnam, Fort Hall Lincoln Creek Lodge, Fort Hall Putnam Lodge, and Trail Creek Campground. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
